room_title: Escape room "Quarantine" by Raleigh Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
room_description:
After two years working alongside members of the public under the code name Formula Of Escape, Assistant X has finally been able to solve what they believe is the cure to Dr. Oxy's "extreme insanity and cannibalistic behavior". However, once the serum is prescribed, Assistant X realizes they have made a grave mistake.
With only minutes to live, you will find both Assistant X and yourselves in very desperate circumstances. Will you be able to find and create the real antidote before it's too late?
